name: 2QT (working title)
description:
Want to crunch the bad monster and smooch the cute ones? Of course you do!

Travel the world, make friends, DATE those friends. This game is just full of good wholesome fun with lots of violence and sexual themes.

This is an early work in progress game focused around the idea of building relationships through adventure. Fight your way from town to town with customizable weapons and parties. Once you arrive in town explore bonds with the people you meet and they just might join you on the adventure forward <3

This build is a rough demo of the combat system. For now you have to take my word on the rest of the stuff.  Enemy models are currently ripped from another game. They'll be outta there soon, promise!

If you would like to give some feedback or would like to talk about collaborating I humbly ask you to slide into my DMs on twitter @dumpstertree.
